title: SMC_AxisDistanceSubMode (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_AxisDistanceSubMode :
Determines how axis distances are interpreted for transition mode
MC_TRANSITION_MODE.TMAxisDistance
.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: Maximum
rows.Comment: Blending is done once the first axis reaches the distance

rows.Name: Euclidean
rows.Comment: Blending is done once the euclidean distance is reached.
